name: Privacy-aware computational genomics
tagline: An official satellite workshop of GIW/InCoB 2015. September 8, 2015. Tokyo, Japan
body:
## Welcome to Privacy-Aware-Computational-Genomics 2015

## Keynote speakers

## Organizers
### General Co-Chairs
[Kana Shimizu](http://cbrc3.cbrc.jp/~shimizu/index.php), National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology, Japan

Takahiro Matsuda, National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology, Japan

[Antti Honkela](https://www.hiit.fi/u/ahonkela/),  University of Helsinki, Finland

### Program Committee
[Hiroaki Kikuchi](http://www.isc.meiji.ac.jp/~kikn/profile2013-e.html), Meiji University, Japan

[Jun Sakuma](http://www.mdl.cs.tsukuba.ac.jp/~jun/index.html), Tsukuba University, Japan

Natsuko Yamamoto, Osaka University, Japan
